detail_desc: Wide shirt in a soft weave with a collar, button placket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and buttoned cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sequined hat in a soft knit with a faux fur pompom on top.

Single-breasted tuxedo jacket in cotton velvet with satin details. Fastening with one covered button at the front, and decorative buttons at the cuffs. One chest pocket, jetted front pockets, and two inner pockets, one with a button. Double back vent. Lined. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Dress in sequined mesh with short, flounced sleeves, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and a flounce at the hem. Lined.
Suit waistcoat in a weave containing some linen with buttons down the front, fake welt front pockets and a sewn-on, decorative tab at the back. Lined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, ties at the sides and gathered seams at the back.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Strapless swimsuit with a hole pattern, lined cups and a low-cut back. Metal fastening at the back and lined bottom. Detachable shoulder straps included.
Long-sleeved top in slub cotton jersey with decorative flounces at the top.
Pyjamas with a strappy top and shorts in soft cotton jersey with lace details. Top with a gentle V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist.

Cardigan in soft sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, ribbed stand-up collar, kangaroo pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the cardigan is organic.
Oversized top in cotton sweatshirt fabric with sewn-on ribbon embroidery at the front, a ribbed neckline and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with reversible sequins on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins) and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Shawl collar, concealed pockets in the side seams, 3/4-length sleeves with gathers at the cuffs, and a tie belt at the waist. No fasteners. Lined.
Boxer briefs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined, wrapover hood, ribbed cuffs and straight-cut hem. Soft brushed inside.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Concealed elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Shirt in an airy linen weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Dance leggings in microfibre with an elasticated waist.
All in-one pyjamas in soft, patterned cotton jersey with short sleeves, a button placket, and elasticated seam at the waist and short legs.
Long, straight-cut shirt in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Chest pockets with a pleat, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Short skirt in a cotton weave. Regular waist with elasticated smocking, and a seam at the hem with a wide broderie anglaise flounce. Lined.

Skinny-fit dungarees in washed, superstretch denim with adjustable straps, a high waist and zip in one side. Chest pocket, fake front pockets, real back pockets and flap leg pockets with a press-stud.

Shirt in sturdy cotton twill with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with a sleeve placket and buttoned cuffs, and a straight-cut hem.
Long-sleeved top in patterned sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with fringing at the front, a zip at the top and a braided shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end. Lined. Size 15x18 cm.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a low, roll-edge neckline and roll edges around the sleeves.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and contrasting colour trims.
Jacket in a sturdy cotton weave with a detachable, lined hood, yoke at the back and long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Polo-neck jumper in a soft, rib-knit cashmere blend in a relaxed, straight fit with long sleeves.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and short slits in the sides.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a lined drawstring hood, print motif and kangaroo pocket. Gently dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved, knee-length dress in stretch jersey crêpe with a wrapover V-neck, seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with side pockets and covered elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist.
Leggings in stretch jersey with an elasticated waist.
Fitted velour body with sparkly stones, a stand-up collar, long sleeves and a concealed zip at the back. Decoration in sparkly stones at the top and press-studs at the crotch.
Short skirt in stretch twill with embroidery on the front and a concealed zip in the side. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in pleated chiffon with a round neck, pin-tucks at the front and over the shoulders and short sleeves. Concealed buttons at the front, and concealed elastication and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Satin lining.
Short-sleeved jersey top with a chest pocket and gently rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Derby shoes in imitation leather with lacing at the front and a welt seam around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles. Heel 2 cm.

prod_name: SB Samuel water repelle jkt TP
detail_desc: Padded jacket in a water-repellent weave with a padded, detachable hood, stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets with a press-stud. Reflective details. Partly lined in fleece. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Short, straight-cut dress in soft cotton jersey with 3/4-length sleeves.
Short top in ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with narrow shoulder straps.
Round-necked T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist and side pockets. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.

Set with a T-shirt in cotton jersey and pair of shorts in cotton sweatshirt fabric. Round-necked T-shirt with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and print motif on the front that continues onto the appliqué at one side. Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, appliqué at one side and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fitted, calf-length dress in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with narrow shoulder straps. Unlined.
Short flared skirt in rustling woven fabric with a slight sheen. Elasticated waist with gathers and side pockets. Lined.
Warm-lined, waterproof hi-tops in imitation leather and canvas with a hook and loop tab, elasticated lacing at the front and reflective details. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Patterned sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves.

Bandeau bra in glittery jersey with a concealed silicone trim at the top, mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Straight-cut blouse in a slightly stretchy weave with a V-neck and short cap sleeves.
Sleeveless top in airy, softly draping jersey with a lace-trimmed V-neck. Slightly longer at the back.
Dress in soft lace with narrow shoulder straps and an elasticated seam at the waist. Jersey lining.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.

Set with a knitted jacket and pair of trousers lined with soft, thermal fleece made partly from recycled polyester. Jacket with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, long raglan sleeves and front pockets. Trousers with an elasticated waist.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. High waist and skinny legs.
Long-sleeved dress in patterned jersey made from recycled polyester. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the top, and a seam with smocking under the bust and at the cuffs.
Round-necked T-shirt in cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Playsuit in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend with elastication and a wide flounce at the top and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Skirts in soft cotton jersey, one with an all-over print. Covered elastication at the waist, gathers at the top and a decorative bow at the front. Unlined.
T-shirt in cotton jersey.
Sports top in soft, fast-drying, functional fabric with short cap sleeves and a longer inner top with a racer back.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Striped scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 55x160 cm.
Top in soft, printed cotton jersey with short puff sleeves.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a double-layered yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.

Calf-length dress in an airy, patterned weave with a round neck and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs, and a smocked seam at the waist. Lined skirt.
Soft, lined bra in stretch silk with lace details. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and wide elastication at the hem.
Short dungaree shorts in washed stretch denim with a chest pocket and adjustable straps. Buttons at the sides, a fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Leggings in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum movement with an all-over print, elasticated waist and fake front pockets.

Trousers in stretch cotton corduroy with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a round neck, short sleeves, and gathered seam under the bust for added width and soft draping.
Baby Exclusive. T-shirt in soft slub jersey made from organic cotton with a text print. Press-stud on one shoulder and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
